body: i’m thankful that though when i was running and tried to pass a family of geese and the largest goose jumped up and flew at me while quacking very angrily, i jumped back and did not come into physical contact with the goose. i’m thankful to have crossed the street and continued on home, where i facetimed my mom to wish her a happy mother’s day.
